review_data.title: Tartare Heaven
review_data.content: The best Steak Tartare in Zurich, which even comes in different variations (such as slightly grilled). All the other meat selections are fantastic, too, which should not come as a surprise, since Hatecke is top-notch butchery. Throw in a very friendly priced wine list and...More

review_data.title: Absolute Weltklasse! Tartar
review_data.content: Absolute Weltklasse! Tartar ist das beste der Stadt. Bedienungen hervorragend. Interieur minimalistisch, der Fokus liegt schließlich auf dem Fleisch. Herrlich!

review_data.title: put on gloves pls !
review_data.content: The quality of the food (Tartar and Roast-beef) is excellent! The servings and plates are very minimal - no side dishes. In contrast with the very clean place are the “cooks” who handle the raw beef (e.g. Tartar) without gloves and hand washing - after...More

review_data.title: Very good meaty food
review_data.content: We visit with family and friends. The beef tartare is very good. The roast-beef is superb. The service is good, price high but in the swiss average. Only comment : the employee that was cutting the meat opens the door and shakes hands with customers...More

review_data.title: What a show stopping business

review_data.title: new opend Butcher with a superb small restaurant
